website_summaries.verdict: Dressed in a simple design, the DC Anvil boasts a classic skateboarding shoe's good looks that work great as a casual shoe as well. The Anvil stays true to its skate heritage by not following trends and offering it in different colorways for individualism. Its no-nonsense, minimal style resonates well with casual wearers who are into timelessly designed footwear.With this shoe's vulcanized sole and well-made construction at a very affordable cost, many skaters and non-skaters alike consider it a great everyday shoe for its excellent comfort, durability, and versatility.
pros: Most wearers highly commend the comfort that the DC Anvil shoe provides
This pair's vulcanized sole offers excellent board feel and flexibility
A good number of users commend this shoe's arch support
The DC Anvil comes in a variety of colorways
A significant number of users admire the shoe's style, stating that it is classic and looks great
Several purchasers are delighted that this pair's simple design is versatile enough to be worn on different occasions
The shoe's quality materials and construction impress some shoe users
Launched at a price of $60, a good number of buyers regard these sneakers as a good product at an affordable price
cons: A significant amount of consumers disclose that the shoe runs narrower than standard sizes
Some shoe users notice that this pair tends to wear out quickly

customer_reviews.title: Covid19 strikes again
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always bought dc shoes because I’ve known them come wide. I had a pair of 10.5 adidas shoes that were fine and I bought these in 11. The length and toe box was fine but the wrap around the top of the foot at the base of the tongue was so tight it was painful. Even without any of the laces in! I feel like whoever stitched this pair must have screwed up. I don’t want to order a larger size because then my foot would be swimming forward, back and side to side. Damn covid and not being able to try on in person first!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: shoes are for feet.
customer_reviews.text: If you stepped on my toes, I could say," I'm not your shoe get offa my sole."
customer_reviews.author: DevT

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a women's 7, so I ordered a men's 6 and they fit very well. Probably could have even gone with a 5.5 if they came that small. Felt a little stiff and narrow at first but after an hour or so they are fine.
customer_reviews.author: vtpaca

customer_reviews.title: Tight on toes
customer_reviews.text: I buy this shoe over and over again. I’ve had canvas, roughout, and suede. This pair was suede. Toe box was very tight. I don’t remember this being the case with the last pair of suede I had. I used a hair dryer with my feet in them to loosen them up. Still pretty tight. Not sure if it’s just a manufacturer mistake or if the material used has less give.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: They run small on the wide.
customer_reviews.text: They fit on the long side but they are to narrow on the side. It actually hurts. Never had this with DC shoes before. I may end up returning them. Don't think I will be able to walk with them.
customer_reviews.author: CDR Electrical Inc.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 14 year old son for school since he seems to eat through shoes. As usual 100% happy with DC product. It's the only brand that seems to last him. Bought it a size larger according to the suggestion and can't be happier. He loves it and wants another. Shopping for it as I type. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Good arch support, sides are stiff though
customer_reviews.text: I like that these shoes have some fairly good arch support in them. I've tried on some Vans and other shoes that look similar to these and the insides of them were almost flat. The lack of arch support almost feels like you're walking around barefoot--it hurts your feet after awhile. The only thing I don't like about these shoes are that the sides are pretty stiff. When you walk around they don't flex very easily and the sides just kind of press against your feet. Other than the stiffness, these are great shoes.
customer_reviews.author: D. Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Mfg sent wrong size! Sent size 14 instead of 9
customer_reviews.text: The shoes looked perfect in every way, the problem was we ordered size 9 and we received size 14 way to big!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Weatherford

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and not a fake.
customer_reviews.text: Love the them but my fault for ordering the wrong size. I was hoping my feel was smaller than 12 I guess not.
customer_reviews.author: Warren Manrow

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe, fits well.
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe, I have a little more narrow shoe than usual and fits well.
customer_reviews.author: Apple

customer_reviews.title: PAPER THIN SOLES!
customer_reviews.text: The heels on mine had a hole worn in them after 3 weeks and I don't even walk very much. I've been continuing to wear them anyway to try and at least get my money's worth. I really wanted rubber-soled sneakers and thought these were great when I first got them, but they flat out suck. I also had to return the first ones, because they are a full size smaller than what is listed.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Petrovitch

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't Purchase Again...
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these shoes for my husband in December 2015. By February 2016, the shoes were already deteriorating on the bottom. He works outside for a living, but we've had other brands that sell similar styles last us nearly eight months before showing signs of wearing out. Wouldn't recommend these for anyone who wears them on a daily basis for work. They weren't too pricey, so that was the only saving grace.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley E.

customer_reviews.title: Skate shoes
customer_reviews.text: The soles are not firmly attached but they're still the DC's I know and love.
customer_reviews.author: T. Ableiter

customer_reviews.title: LOVE them - so comfy and fit perfectly
customer_reviews.text: These are my skydiving and wind tunnel shoes! LOVE them - so comfy and fit perfectly. They've also held up better than previous DC shoes I've owned.
customer_reviews.author: Pink_Dragon17

customer_reviews.title: Very nice shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shoes !!! My son wears them until they are completely falling apart so I bought 2 pairs. He likes them a lot & they look great too fits his style. 😊😁 👍 From a mom.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzard

customer_reviews.title: Old but still got Game
customer_reviews.text: Got problems with the Dogs.. Nerve damage & 57 years of being me. These and the Spenco Polysorb heavy duty inserts. Got me moving again. I watched those kids jumping skateboards.. Hell why not. They do run smallish, I bought a 10-1/2 to fit a 9-1/2. with the inserts. But they were tight buying the correct size. Had to return the first set, Were tight with out the inserts...FYI
customer_reviews.author: SHAME

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!! I had a pair that wore out ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect!! I had a pair that wore out loved them so much I bought another. Exactly what I ordered. Great product that are durable too
customer_reviews.author: Michael Whisler

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe for my husband. Wears them to work for 8 hours everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Jessi Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Nice kicks need them in wide tho
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes looks great better then pic but not if you got wide feet narrow in toes. Other then that good shoe maybe go up size if looking for room in width.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shoe's
customer_reviews.text: Very good shoe the only thing I don't like is it doesn't have enough cushion for your foot other than that they are a decent pair of shoes

customer_reviews.title: Size 9.5 US - Black
customer_reviews.text: This boots is great! Would definitely recommend buying. It give you this "I'm so comfortable in my boots" feeling. It fits as expected. You won't be disappointed, for sure.

customer_reviews.title: Loved them
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved the shoes. They need some breaking in before he can wear them to work but good day to day shoes!

customer_reviews.title: looks good, but tight fit
customer_reviews.text: these shoes look really good, and they give me good arch support for an everyday shoes. my one complaint is that they are really tight in the toe section, and i even ordered them a half size bigger. if you have wider than normal feet, then maybe look for a different company.
customer_reviews.author: Grendle

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: Shoes run WAY to small. I wear size 13 so I ordered 13. I cant even fit my foot fully in the shoe. I'm in the process of returning them to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: DC hard to size
customer_reviews.text: tried a 10.5 way too small then went 11 it also seemed too small especially in the width. good buying experience but I'm heading back to Vans for now

customer_reviews.title: however they feel like cheap suede and not leather at all
customer_reviews.text: Decent shoes, however they feel like cheap suede and not leather at all. The picture looks better than they do in person. Love DC though.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Not a lot of cushion, but otherwise a really great shoe for the price. Plus they are black like my soul. I’d definitely recommend these.

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: In order bid a size 7.5 and got a size 7. why my son can not use them as too small ....

customer_reviews.title: Just a touch small but will work.. If ...
customer_reviews.text: Just a touch small but will work.. If I were to buy them again I will go from the 10 I have to a 10 1/2...

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my Husband, he was so excited. They are great.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great buy for a son who needs all black shoes for school. Cool, comfortable and he LOVES them.

customer_reviews.title: As expected 👍 in all expectations

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, true to size, and all around great buy!

customer_reviews.title: like, these shoes are amazing
customer_reviews.text: Girl, like, these shoes are amazing. They match so many shirts and pants. Such a good buy.

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy!
customer_reviews.text: It took 2 weeks more than what was said. But when I recieved the shoes, I was happy. They are nice.

customer_reviews.title: Top quality Skate Shoe!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 19 yr. old, not knowing his style! DC Skate Shoe was a hit!!! Top quality too!!!
customer_reviews.author: loretta barreto

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I had the exact same shoes before I bought these. This pair was smaller and were uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: R. Go

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: They fit just right and they are very comfortable to walk in. I've brought DC shoes in the past and I've always been satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Alans Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: stylish and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Brought these for my son who works in retail. He says they fit great and at the end of his shift his feet aren't aching, also has a good arch support. He has a narrow foot and wears a thicker sock with them, not a dress sock. I would also add that they are totally black,edge of shoe and the sole which is very difficult to find unless they are an athletic style. I do need to agree with some of the other reviewers in that they run somewhat small we ordered up a half size after reading reviews.
customer_reviews.author: an avid seeker

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable fit and worth the price
customer_reviews.text: My last pair of shoes were Vans and similar to this style. The Vans felt weak and hurt my feet for quite some time until breaking them in. These DCs have given me no problems at all for being brand new. They feel durable and the simple design is great.
customer_reviews.author: Zarsen Iza

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied and happy
customer_reviews.text: They were a little tight on the sides when I first put them on, but after wearing them for about an hour they became very comfortable (they break in easily).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the way these shoes look and fit. The black on black are perfectly plain.
customer_reviews.author: Echo462

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have big feet, they were not as wide as most size 13
customer_reviews.author: Robert lane

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE SHOES
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THESE SHOES. THEY ARE VERY COMFORTABLE AT WORK BECAUSE I'M ON MY FEET ALL DAY AND THEY GIVE GREAT SUPPORT. GREAT BUY

customer_reviews.text: size ran small, so it did not fit well for me... had to send it back

customer_reviews.title: Best way to find the shoe you want in the size you need!
customer_reviews.text: DC has been my sons go to shoe of choice . No surprises . The great shoe I expected at a good price shipped right to my door . No searching for that large hard to find size that most stores only stock one pair of ! Thanks Amazon!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really good looking shoe. Just happened to be too narrow for my foot.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Product.
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for my grandson age 12. In the a lot liked them. If he could sleep with them on. Good quality and are durable.

customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great! they are very comfortable and i even get away with wearing them at work! get them if they got them! havnt used them at all for skating though, they seem like they will rip in 2 days.

customer_reviews.text: I like to work with comfort and style. These shoes are excellent

customer_reviews.text: These are some nice shoes and They ship fast. I would buy from here again any time. DC has been my favorit skate shoe for years and These are the real deal.

product_meta.title: DC Men's Anvil Skate Shoe
product_meta.description: Special features include: mesh lining with vent holes for breathability and vulcanized construction
feature_bullets: Vulcanized construction for great board feel & sole flex
Material Composition: UPPER: LEATHER / LINING: TEXTILE / OUTSOLE: RUBBER
